EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - March 2018 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER March 2018 TOTAL RUNWAY POSITIONAL AWARENESS SmartRunway® and SmartLanding® increase pilots' positional awareness during taxi, take-off and landing at the most challenging airports...
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/smartrunway-and-smartlanding]]> Jeppesen Terminal Charts now available through GoDirect Flight Bag Pro version 1.4 The Honeywell GoDirect Flight Bag Pro version 1.4 app allows pilots to create flight plans, view weather conditions and access flight briefing information through a unified user platform. You will need the latest version to access charts...
Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> Honeywell expands Connected Aircraft reach with new router The GoDirect Router maximizes available onboard Wi-Fi bandwidth and enables a reliable, in-flight wireless connection on any network...
Learn more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2018/march/honeywell-expands-connected-aircraft-reach-with-versatile-new-router]]> What's new in the MyAerospace Portal? We are committed to making it easier and faster for you to access support and do business with us... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/myaerospace-updates]]> Don't miss out on a Honeywell Operators Conference, register now Honeywell Operators Conferences provide opportunities to meet with Honeywell representatives. Each conference focuses on maintenance, operations, service, and support...
Conference schedule and registration <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/january/2018-operator-conferences]]>
